summary: Adds a new kind of shrine and a respective custom-textured amulet next to the Skytemple ruins behind Winterhold's College. Includes a map marker
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#efefef][size=3][b]Do you love adventuring but live in the constant fear of getting shot in the knee?[/b] 
Have you ever fought one of these glorious Horkers and noticed
[i][color=#ffffff][b]how perfect it would be to have no legs, just like them? [/b][/color]
[/i]This mod won't turn you into one, neither it will get rid of your legs, as vulnerable as they are. But for the low price of gently or seducingly clicking the [b]Download[/b] button you can preach to his almighty leg-less-ness and receive a blessing which will make you able to vanquish those who aim for your knees before they can force you into a boring city-guard life. [/size][/color][color=#efefef][/color][/center][color=#efefef]

[b][color=#6fa8dc][size=3]~~~~Wat~~~~[/size][/color][/b]
-The second part in the series of shrines that some random guys on Steam and Nexus requested 

-With some Horkers around it to protect it... [i]*cough*[/i] 

-Again, the big boss is carrying the respective amulet [i](I'm kind of getting the hang out of this retexturing stuff, I just suck at the editing part)[/i] 

[b][color=#6d9eeb][size=3]~~~~Why~~~~[/size][/color][/b]
-[b]Because someone suggested it[/b] 

-If you're reading this, don't do anything special because of it 

[color=#76a5af][size=3]~~~~Wham~~~~[/size][/color]
-December is coming, prepare your butts for [i]Last Christmas[/i] 

-This hasn't got anything to do with this mod, but most of what I do barely has to do with itself 

[color=#a2c4c9][size=4]~~~~WHERE~~~~[/size][/color]
[size=3][b]There is a map.[/b] [/size]

[b][color=#9fc5e8][size=3]~~~~Credits~~~~[/size][/color][/b][/color]
[url=steam://openurl/http://youtu.be/EzoazPPC7b8?t=1m19s]Click here[/url]
author: McBook
